mission.posting: Kurisu wants me to go through an initiation of sorts. Alright then.

email.subject: Initiation
email.body:
This is your little task before you get to join Sakura.
I've attached a link to an ePhone. Your job is to hack into that ePhone and find me the admin password. This is such an easy task, I'd be surprised if you managed to fuck it up somehow.
-Kurisu

attachments.note: I have to hack into an ePhone and find the admin password. Sounds easy enough.
